name: Tomato Flip
description:
EC Games Commemorative First Game "Tomato Flip

For Video Creators and Streamers
EC Games is allowing monetization through our partner program using EC Games games.

Take control of a tomato and run through various stages!

Game Description
You control a tomato and perform actions such as moving and jumping.
The game is cleared when the tomato jumps into the pots and pans in the stages.

Game Features
There are 5 stages in the game, each with a different world view.
After selecting a stage, you can choose between "Easy Mode" with checkpoints and "Normal Mode" without checkpoints, allowing even beginners to play athletic games with ease.
There are three hidden coins in the stage, which can be collected to unlock the stage.
Clear time is also measured in the game, so please try again and again to set a new record!
